servinfo.title: DTC U1100 (No. 1100): Lost Communication with ECM

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC U0155 (No. 0155): Lost Communication with Instrument Panel Cluster (IPC) Control Module .

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: BCM can not receive CAN data from ECM for longer than specified time continuously.

s1.ptxt: Connect scan tool to DLC with ignition switch turned OFF.
Turn ON ignition switch and clear DTC by using scan tool.
Start engine and run it for 1 min. or more.

testgroup.title: DTC check of BCM
testgroup.question: Is DTC U1100 (No. 1100) and DTC U1073 (No. 1073) detected together?

action.ptxt: Go to DTC U1073 (No. 1073): Control Module Communication Bus Off .
Go to DTC U0073: Control Module Communication Bus Off .

testgroup.title: DTC check of ABS or ESP® control module

test1.ptxt: Check DTC for ABS or ESP® control module.

testgroup.question: Is DTC U1073 detected?

action.ptxt: Go to DTC U1073: Control Module Communication Bus Off .

test1.ptxt: Check connection of connectors of all control modules communicating by means of CAN.

action.ptxt: Intermittent trouble. Check for intermittent referring to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection .

testgroup.title: DTC check of ABS or ESP® control module

test1.ptxt: Check DTC for ABS or ESP® control module.

testgroup.question: Is DTC U1100 detected?

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connectors from ECM and ABS or ESP® control module.
Check CAN communication circuit between ECM and ABS or ESP® control module for open, short and high resistance.

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit in good condition?

action.ptxt: Check ECM power and ground circuit. If circuit is OK, substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connectors from BCM and ABS or ESP® control module.
Check CAN communication circuit between BCM and ABS or ESP® control module for open, short and high resistance.

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit in good condition?

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connectors of all control modules communicating by means of CAN.
Check CAN communication circuit between control modules other than Step 7 for open, short and high resistance.

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit in good condition?

test1.ptxt: Connect connectors of disconnected control modules communicating by means of CAN.
Disconnect connector of any one of control module other than BCM.

action.ptxt: Disconnect connectors of control modules other than the one whose connector is disconnected in Step 2) one by one and check that DTC U1100 is detected by BCM each time connector is disconnected. When DTC U1100 is not detected by BCM while checking in this way, go to description under “NO” below. If DTC U1100 is detected by BCM even when connectors of all control modules that use CAN communication with BCM are disconnected, substitute a known-good BCM and recheck.
Check power and ground circuit of control module disconnected in Step 2). If circuit is OK, substitute a known-good control module disconnected in Step 2) and recheck.
